messages.subject: triathlon
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/7/03 11:51:41 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/7/03 11:51:41 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Maybe it depends on where you live. Since the Northwest has about 3
dependable months without rain, almost every race imaginable is
squeezed into that timeframe - July through September, with August
being the least rainy and therefore most popular. >>

OH! See, I forget what the rest of the country lives in, I'm so spoiled.
Tri-season here is mainly March through October, but there are runs and races
all year really.
FL is the capital of triathlon (as far as how many are held).

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
